summary: Budapest is Hungary's largest city and the heart of the country. It formed when three cities (Buda, Ã“buda, and Pest) united in 1873. With a rich history, it was once ruled by Romans, Hungarians, and Ottomans. Today, Budapest is a global hub for business, art, and education. It's home to many universities and famous sites like the Hungarian Parliament. The city has a unique landscape with the Danube River dividing it, and it's known for its thermal springs. Budapest attracts millions of tourists yearly due to its beauty and historical significance.
title: Budapest
